title: Do Fit(Android wear)
summary: Android wear using only watch's sensors.Fixed issue for Number format

descriptionHTML:
If you have an android wear? And do you enjoy Fitness?
Then, try our Beta app!

The New Paradigm of Fitness
Automatically recognized by the Android wear

Gym Exercise
If you want a solid muscular body and a nice Do Fitness !!
Try to download the application challenging the exercise.
Exercise helps automatically recognize and guide the movement by using the Smart Watch.
Count yourself to exercise, and helps calculate the calories.
No extra operation makes automatically determine the movement and count.
Is this how to exercise their own?
Create your own exercise can be performed automatically determined.

It shows the movement and describes his state of over 300.

App Features and Benefits:
* Motion determination and the number of times measured by the acceleration, and a gyro sensor
* Exercise time, break time automatic measurement
* Audio and vibration feedback
* Automatic calculation of calories using a heart rate sensor
* Provided by the movement history list and calendar
* Provide motivation through Rankings
* 300+ Exercise Information

Fitness, Health, diet, gym, workout, exercise
comments: Vorrei la sezione stretching e poter dividere in più workout le giornate di allenamento. Grazie. Da ora è già ottima!
Almost Just needs Google Fit integration for five stars.
Dude it wont connect to the internet... it says check connection andjist has the loading circle
It sucks.. cannot pair.. cannot connect..
